title: Putin is weakened after direct challenge, U.S. officials say
description: In a rare show of bipartisan agreement, U.S. officials and lawmakers said the brief rebellion by the Wagner Group had weakened Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Mercenary boss warned of revolution in Russia, but his own was short-lived
description: Wagner boss Yevgeniy Prigozhin was branded a traitor by President Vladimir Putin. But after a brief rebellion, Prigozhin won popular support and lived to fight another day.

title: Putin is reaping what he sowed
description: A jarring challenge to the Kremlin's control seems to have been staved off. But the damage to Putin’s image and authority may be lasting.

title: Uneasy calm returns to Russia in wake of armed revolt by Wagner Group
description: The Kremlin’s truce with Wagner chief Yevgeniy Prigozhin appeared to hold after his forces withdrew from a regional military headquarters in southern Russia.

title: Scenes from Wagner’s mutiny: Coffee in camo, street sweeping between tanks
description: As armed Wagner mercenaries took over the military headquarters in Rostov-on-Don, in a shocking rebellion, some Russians appeared unfazed.

title: Human remains found in area where actor Julian Sands went missing
description: Sands was reported missing in the Mount Baldy area of California's San Gabriel Mountains in January. Authorities have conducted eight searches for him since.

title: Live updates: Wagner boss backs down after stunning challenge to Putin
description: Yevgeniy Prigozhin, the head of the mercenary group, halted his fighters’ approach on Moscow after a day of rising tensions in Russia. Follow for live updates.

title: A pro-Russian tide in Slovakia could threaten Europe’s unity on Ukraine
description: Robert Fico, a populist former prime minister, has risen in polls while promising to end military aid to Ukraine and veto “pointless” E.U. sanctions on Russia.

title: U.S. spies learned in mid-June Prigozhin was planning armed action in Russia
description: The intelligence fed concerns about whether Vladimir Putin would remain in power and what any instability could mean for control of Russia’s nuclear arsenal.

title: Ramzan Kadyrov offered troops to stop Wagner. Here’s what to know about him.
description: Ramzan Kadyrov, Chechnya’s leader, remained steadfastly loyal to Vladimir Putin as tensions with Wagner heated up Saturday.

title: As Russia uprising subsides, U.S., allies brace for what comes next
description: Yevgeniy Prigozhin’s extraordinary showdown with Vladimir Putin has dealt a serious blow to the stability of the Russian regime, observers say.
